workouts.name: Planks
workouts.description: Get ready to strengthen your core with this intense plank workout. Planks are an effective exercise for building core stability and endurance. Follow along and challenge yourself with this session!
instructions: Get into a push-up position on the floor.
Bend your elbows 90 degrees and rest your weight on your forearms.
Your elbows should be directly beneath your shoulders, and your body should form a straight line from your head to your feet.
Hold the position for as long as possible.
Remember to breathe.

workouts.name: Bicycle Crunches
workouts.description: Get ready to engage your entire core with this dynamic bicycle crunch workout. Bicycle crunches are a powerhouse exercise that targets the upper and lower abdominals, obliques, and hip flexors. Follow along with this session to sculpt a strong and defined midsection!
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head.
Lift your legs off the ground and bend your knees to a 90-degree angle.
Bring your right elbow towards your left knee while straightening your right leg.
Switch sides, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee while straightening your left leg.
Continue alternating sides in a pedaling motion.

workouts.name: Leg Raises
workouts.description: Get ready to sculpt and strengthen your lower abs with this intense leg raise workout. Leg raises are a fantastic exercise for targeting the lower abdominal muscles and improving core stability. Follow this session for a quick and effective lower ab burn!
instructions: Lie on your back with your legs straight and your arms by your sides.
Lift your legs off the ground until they are perpendicular to the floor.
Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Keep your core engaged and your lower back pressed into the floor throughout the movement.
Repeat for the specified duration.
